name: Warp Driver
description:
You play as astronaut Crisp Rat. An intergalactic space travelling rodent with a very unstable space ship that will blow up if you overload the engine. Hop from galaxy to galaxy through a series of wormholes while avoiding asteroids, planets and black holes!

----- !It's basically space golf! ----- Download it for the best experience and play it full screen for the second best experience!

We have an online leaderboard! Where players are ranked by the number of charged boosts they took. When replaying the game make sure you uncheck “show guide” so you can quickly climb the ranks of the leaderboard. The leaderbaord can take a bit of time to upload (up to a minute if the server is hibernating).

Controls: 

Drag and release your mouse to launch your spaceship

Space bar to zoom out

'R' to respawn

Esc to return to menu

This is our entry to Ludum Dare 49 the theme was: Unstable 

1.2 Hotfixes

- Fixed leaderboards not working on web

 - Fixed sound effect not being played 

- Slightly changed the last level

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/warp-driver
